summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Weed & Seed Program in Central and Southeast Seattle; authorizing the execution of an agreement with the United States Department of Justice for financial assistance in the amount of Five Hundred Fifty Thousand Dollars ($550,000); accepting the money when received; increasing the 2002 Budgets of the Police Department and the Human Services Department by making reimbursable appropriations; and ratifying and confirming prior acts; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
